title: IIM Lucknow Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Senior Research Assistant Post
description: Indian Institute of Management Lucknow (IIM Lucknow) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the IIM Lucknow Recruitment 2025 . Here we provided information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, Education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
